long_desc.thetext: subdownloader-2.0.18-4.fc21.noarch.rpm has /usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/subdownloader directory, while subdownloader-2.0.18-5.fc23.noarch.rpm has /subdownloader instead. It is probably a mistake.

yeah , dnf repoquery -l subdownloader (...) /subdownloader/gui/images/flags/kk.png /subdownloader/ (..) may be you just need to rebuild it . I rebuild the package and things had back to /usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/subdownloader/
It was rebuilt, now I have subdownloader-2.0.18-6.fc24.noarch, but it still has /subdownloader.

Ping Jan Klepek, may you let me update this package ? you just need give me commit access here : https://admin.fedoraproject.org/pkgdb/package/rpms/subdownloader/
I built subdownloader here: https://copr.fedorainfracloud.org/coprs/sergiomb/builds_for_Stable_Releases/build/311116/
works much better, and do the job , but still not find how make left click works ...
